content.question: With the creation of Olympia, Manet inspired

choices.label: the development of a looser style that uses unblended brushstrokes
the birth of a new type of portrait painting, as encouraged by the Paris Salon
a revival of interest in the form of the Classical female nude
a resurgence of the use of chiaroscuro to create gradual tonal shifts

content.answer: the development of a looser style that uses unblended brushstrokes

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
